member.name: WS_METADATA_EXCHANGE_TYPE
member.summary: Information about enabling and disabling types of metadata exchange.

member.name: WS_METADATA_EXCHANGE_TYPE.WS_METADATA_EXCHANGE_TYPE_NONE
member.summary:
Disables WS-MetadataExchange/HTTP GET servicing on the .
This is the default value of property.

member.name: WS_METADATA_EXCHANGE_TYPE.WS_METADATA_EXCHANGE_TYPE_MEX
member.summary: Enables servicing of WS-MetadataExchange 1.1 request servicing on the .

member.name: WS_METADATA_EXCHANGE_TYPE.WS_METADATA_EXCHANGE_TYPE_HTTP_GET
member.summary: Enables servicing of HTTP GET request servicing on the for metadata retrieval.
